mapper.select: SELECT G.PLANT_CODE AS PLANT_CODE, P.PLANT_NAME AS PLANT_NAME, P.OPT_TEMP AS OPT_TEMP, P.MAX_TEMP AS MAX_TEMP, P.MIN_TEMP AS MIN_TEMP, P.MIN_PH AS MIN_PH, P.MAX_PH AS MAX_PH, P.MAX_EC AS MAX_EC, P.MIN_EC AS MIN_EC, G.FARMING_DATE AS FARMING_DATE FROM G_PLANT G, PLANT P WHERE G.SF_CODE=#{sfCode} AND G.AP_CODE=#{apCode} AND P.PLANT_CODE=G.PLANT_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO G_PLANT ( SF_CODE, AP_CODE, PLANT_CODE, FARMING_DATE ) VALUES ( #{sfCode}, #{apCode}, #{plantCode}, SYSDATE )

if.foreach: INTO PORT_INFO ( SF_CODE, AP_CODE, PORT_NO, PORT_ST ) VALUES ( #{sfCode}, #{apCode}, #{item.portNo}, #{item.portSt} )

mapper.select: SELECT PORT_NO FROM PORT_INFO WHERE AP_CODE=#{apCode} AND SF_CODE=#{sfCode} ORDER BY PORT_NO ASC
